name: Youda Sushi Chef
summary:
"Be everybody’s favorite sushi chef.”  
  
Quickly serve sushi-hungry customers the right dishes to slowly build up a restaurant empire! Use memory and skills to create the right pieces of Asian cuisine.  
  
There are many new recipes to learn and there is new kitchen equipment to obtain as you choose how to expand your restaurant chain.  
  
Become everyone’s favorite Sushi chef by decorating your restaurant, performing knife tricks or serving some sake to waiting customers.  
  
Stay focused to reach your daily targets even when reservations and takeaway orders might distract you. Keep the sushi coming to earn nice bonuses and extra money.
